list_definition.definition: a broken, collapsed or decayed state

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The civil war led to the ruin of the city.

list_definition.definition: a cause of collapse, decay etc
financial disaster; complete loss of money
to spoil; to treat too indulgently
